dt: {bc}a roofed gate in a churchyard under which a bier rests during the initial part of the burial service

et: Middle English {it}lycheyate{/it}, from {it}lich{/it} body, corpse (from Old English {it}līc{/it}) + {it}gate, yate{/it} gate
shortdef: a roofed gate in a churchyard under which a bier rests during the initial part of the burial service
